item.title: Markdown — Not So Great Anymore? Why More and More Python Projects Use RST?
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: Markdown and reStructuredText (RST) are two commonly used markup languages. This article compares their advantages and disadvantages and shares usage suggestions in different scenarios.
